name: Derelict (itch) (Zoey Reyes)
description:
A Mystery aboard station 771 has left the entire crew AWOL, your mission is to find out what happened. Explore the derelict station and find old logs detailing the events that took place aboard.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Control - Crouch

Tab - Inventory

Created by Zoey Reyes

All assets used are credited in game.
